mods.note: BOMBAY GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINAR U u fc U a t) f lr ti y a u 11) o r i 11>. SATURDAY, 6 tii MARCH 1852. POLITICAL DEPARTMENT. The following Notification is published for general information, by order of the Government of India. By Order of the Right IIotLble the Governor in Council, A. MA LET, Chief Secretary. Bombay Castle, Q>th March 1852. I Additional Notification, The Baragn River and other outlets of the Irrawady are included in the Blockade declared by me on the 6th instant. Given under my hand on board Her Britannic Majesty's Steam Sloop 'Hermes' in the Bassein River the 25th of January 1852. (Signed) G. R. LAMBERT, Commodore in Her Britannic Majesty's Navy. (True Copy.) (Signed) EDWARD THOMAS, Officiating Under Secretary to the Government of India. (True Copy.) , A. MALET, Chief Sccretarv.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The gazette is providing notification that the Baragu River and other outlets of the Irrawady [Irrawwadi River, Myanmar] are included in the blockade declared by G R Lambert, Commodore in the Royal Navy, on 6 March 1852.It should be noted that f. 11 and f. 39 are duplicate copies of this item.
